source.guidance: Secure SHell or SSH is a protocol used to connect one computer to another, usually to access the command-line interface (CLI) on a remote system.
source.name: Define SSH
source.text: <<<Secure SHell>>> is a protocol used to connect one <<<computer>>> to another, usually to access the <<<command-line interface>>> on a remote system.
